wikipedia_page.main: John Marriott Kynoch (born 18 March 1933) is a sport shooter who competed for Great Britain. He won the bronze medal in running game target at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich.Born and raised in New Zealand, Marriott was educated at Huntley School from 1941 to 1946 and Nelson College between 1947 and 1950. He did a short course at Massey Agricultural College before emigrating to Banffshire, Scotland in the early 1950s to work in the family woollen mill.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1972 Summer Olympics
response: * John Kynoch — Shooting, Men's Running Game Target
Fourteen male shooters represented Great Britain in 1972. John Kynoch won bronze in the 50 m running target event.
